short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click from a catetgory of snippets dropdown to copy to your clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily select from multiple categories from a popup dropdown. Simply click what you want and it will automatically be in your clipboard. 
The snippets / code / text / etc... is currently personalized for me and will likely be only useful mainly for coders. I intend on allowing users to upload their own custom assortment. I made this awhile ago for personal use haven't noticed any bugs. Currently I would say the only thing I have noticed, is that the longer dropdowns can be harder to navigate. If enough people start using the extension ill rework the layout into something smoother.
